text: David Datuna (; February 10, 1974 â€“ May 24, 2022) was a Georgian-born American artist. He lived in New York City. He was known for his Viewpoint of Millions series which talked about the meaning of cultural identity from many points of view. Datuna died on May 24, 2022 at a hospital in Boston, Massachusetts from lung cancer at the age of 48. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:People from Georgia (country) Category:Artists from New York City Category:American sculptors
title: David Datuna
